Product Description

For the first time ever, ultimate monsters come to life in all-out ultimate brawls. In Bakugan: Defenders of the Core, you'll sieze real-time control of towering Bakugan as you unleash their fury in action-packed ultimate battles. A thrilling action game that merges fi ghting and stealth adventure gameplay into one awesome experience, you'll control skyscraper-sized Bakugan in your quest to save the world's cities from the evil Spectra and his Vexos armies. The fate of humankind is in your hands!

* For the First Time Ever, Brawl as a Massive Skyscraper-Size Bakugan! Take control of gigantic, enormous Bakugan as you battle your opponents in huge, awesome brawls while you power through vast, destructible environments all over the world! Only you have the power to save the Earth from Spectra and his minions
* The Fate of the World Rests on Your Human Brawler! Explore the World of Bakugan as a human Battle Brawler. Use skills like stealth and problemsolving to uncover the mysterious plot and collect abilities to use against the evil invaders
* Completely Customise Your Bakugan Brawlers! Create and customise your own Bakugan Brawler and help Dan take on an evil enemy who will stop at nothing to take over the Core. You are the Earth's last line of defense!
* Encounter a Whole New World of Bakugan, with New Bakugan and New Upgrades! With over 60 characters and over 30 Bakugan to take into battle, you'll need to gain new moves, new battle gear, and a whole new set of awesome Ability cards in order to pulverize the enemy
* Battle it out with your friends with Multiplayer Modes! Challenge your friends with split-screen multiplayer action and three different game modes. See who is the best Bakugan Brawler on the block
